about_the_game:
Chronac - a unique platformer with engaging gameplay, and a hand-made art style. Choose between solo, co-op, or versus modes and escape alone or bring a friend along. Three different game modes, test your skills or team up to overcome security robots.

features:
  • Original art and gameplay.
  • All split screen game modes are playable with only one keyboard!
  • Created mostly by one person.
  • Using different weapons and/or bots, try to outwit your opponent!
  • Be prepared to fight unforgiving enemies.

The game features three different game modes - solo, where players explore a hand-made world with unique levels and challenges, co-op, where players work together to fight their way out of a factory while facing security robots set to stop them, and versus, where two players can fight against each other in various unique game modes such as deathmatch, territory, search and deliver and secure the radio - all using split-screen or Remote Play Together.

Chronac combines the excitement of platformer games with the unpredictability of hand-made levels and unique gameplay mechanics, offering players a unique and engaging gaming experience. In co-op mode, players need to work together as a team to overcome the challenges set by the factory's security robots, navigating their way through hand-made sections while surviving the robots' onslaught and uncovering special abilities to aid them in their mission.

In versus mode, two players can choose from various unique game modes such as deathmatch, territory, search and deliver and secure the radio. The players need to employ their skills and abilities to outmaneuver their opponents and come out ontop, with the winner getting bragging rights and potentially special rewards and bonuses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller

short_description: CHRONAC! The roguelike action game where you shoot, slash, blast your way out the facility that created you. Gain powerful upgrades, face unforgiving enemies. Together.
